src:
Čačani i dalje bez greške, kraj Morave deklasiran Tamiš
Pančevci parirali samo deset minuta

03 Nov 2019

Nakon pet odigranih kola Košarkaške lige Srbije ekipa Borca jedina je bez poraza. Na svom parketu je bez mnogo muke i peripetija savladala pančevački Tamiš rezultatom 90:64. Zbog svega prikazanog u dosadašnjem delu sezone Čačani se potpuno zasluženo nalaze na vodećoj pozciji u domaćem prvenstvu.
Uprkos očekivanjima, Tamiš je od početka pružao dobar otpor nadmoćnom rivalu. Međutim, to je potrajalo nekih četiri minuta. U nastavku Majstorović je povukao, ostali su ga sledili, tako da je Borac po prvi put stekao opipljivu prednost od sedam poena (15:8). To je primoralo trenera Tamiša da zatraži minut odmora kako bi konsolidovao svoje redove. I uspeo je u tome. Do isteka prve četvrtine Tamiš je, serijom 10:0, uspeo da sustigne Borac i poravna rezultat (18:18).
Seriju koševa iz prve Tamiš je nastavio u drugoj deonici, kada je po prvi put u susretu i poveo (20:21). Međutim, nalet gostiju prekinuo je Kočović pogotkom za tri. Od tog trenutka Borac je zaigrao kako se od njega očekuje, pa je uspostavio kontrolu meča. Polako, ali sigurno, lomio je protivnika i povećavao prednost. Daleko bolju igru u odnosu na Tamiš domaćin je znao da naplati, pa je na veliki odmor otišao mirne glave sa velikim suficitom od 17 koševa (50:33).
Drugo poluvreme otvorio je Đoković pogotkom za tri. Na taj način je produžio dobro šutersko veče svog tima. Posle njega poentirao je i Džouns, tako da je sa pet vezanih poena Borac stekao prednost od 22 koša (55:33). To je ponovo nateralo stratega gostujućeg sastava da posegne za jedinim mogućim rešenjem, minutom za savetovanje. Ipak, za razliku od prve deonice, u trećoj taj potez nije urodio plodom. Čačani su nastavili da drže stvari pod kontrolom, čuvajući stečeni suficit, a čak su ga značajno i uvećali. Bilo je očigledno da je Borac slomio otpor Pančevaca.
U poslednjem delu utakmice Borac je, prosto rečeno, odrađivao posao. Očita dominacija Čačana nije davala gostima nikakvu nadu za preokret. I opet je, kao bezbroj puta do sada, trener Marinović ukazao šansu doslovno svim igračima. Sve u svemu, bila je ovo nova demonstracija sile tima iz grada na Moravi, koji je i nakon ovog  kola ostao neporažen na domaćem terenu.


BORAC – TAMIŠ 90:64 (18:18, 32:15, 22:8, 18:23)

Dvorana: Čačak – Dvorana BorcaGledalaca: 1.000Sudije: Branislav Mrdak, Ivan Stefanović, Duško Sedlar
BORAC: Alikadić 6, Popović 7, Đoković 6, Krsmanović 2, Bumbić 5, Gavrilović 7, Majstorović 11, Kočović 6, Nerandžić 8, Džouns 10, Todorović 9, Čarapić 13.TAMIŠ: Nikolić 5, Čabrilo, Radović 4, Vasić 8, Pavićević 13, Vukojičić 5, Filbič 1, Prlja 11, Janković 3, Lučić 3, Rods 7, Labudović 4.


KOŠARKAŠKA LIGA SRBIJE – 5. KOLO

PetakDunav – Mladost Zemun 89:95/Kovačević 20 - Bibins 21/

Napredak - Dinamik 71:62/Ilkić 18 - Pašajlić, Glas 11/
Vršac - Metalac 79:71/Biler 19 - Stepanović 20/

Pišu: 
Đurđe MEČANIN i Nikola MINOVIĆ

text:
Cacani still error free, end of Morava declared Tamish
The pancakes only steamed for ten minutes

03 Nov 2019

After five rounds of the Serbian Basketball League, the Borac team is the only one without defeat. On her parquet, without much effort and peripetia, she defeated the Pančevo Tamis 90:64. Due to all that has been shown in the season so far, Čačani is fully deserved to be in the leading position in the national championship.
In spite of expectations, the Tamis have resisted the overwhelming rival from the beginning. However, it took about four minutes. In the sequel, Majstorovic withdrew, the others followed, so for the first time the Fighter gained a tangible seven-point advantage (15-8). This forced Coach Tamish to request a minute's rest to consolidate his ranks. And he succeeded in doing so. By the end of the first quarter, Tamis had managed to catch up with Borac in the 10-0 series and even the score (18:18).
He continued the series of points from the first Tamis in the second section, when he first met and led (20:21). However, a rush of guests was interrupted by Kočović by three. From that moment on, the Fighter played as expected and established control of the match. Slowly but surely, he crushed his opponent and increased the lead. A far better game than the Tamis, the host knew how to charge, so he went for a great break with a calm head with a big surplus of 17 points (50:33).
Djokovic opened the second half by scoring three. In doing so, he extended his team’s good shooting night. After that, Jones also scored, so with five points the Fighter gained 22 points (55:33). This again forced the visiting team strategist to reach for the only possible solution, one minute for counseling. However, unlike the first section, in the third this move failed. The citizens of Čačak continued to keep things under control, keeping the surplus gained, and even increasing it significantly. It was obvious that the Fighter had broken the resistance of the Pančevo people.
In the last part of the match, Borac simply did the job. Čačan's apparent dominance did not give the guests any hope of a turnaround. And again, like countless times so far, Coach Marinovic has taken a chance on literally every player. All in all, this was a new demonstration of the strength of the Morava City team, which remained undefeated on home soil after this round.


BORAC - TAMIS 90:64 (18:18, 32:15, 22: 8, 18:23)

Arena: Čačak - Borac HallViewers: 1,000 Referees: Branislav Mrdak, Ivan Stefanovic, Dusko Sedlar
BORAC: Alikadic 6, Popovic 7, Djokovic 6, Krsmanovic 2, Bumbic 5, Gavrilovic 7, Majstorovic 11, Kocovic 6, Nerandzic 8, Jones 10, Todorovic 9, Carapic 13.TAMIS: Nikolic 5, Cabrilo, Radovic 4, Vasic 8 , Pavicevic 13, Vukojicic 5, Filbic 1, Prlja 11, Jankovic 3, Lucic 3, Rods 7, Labudovic 4.


SERBIA BASKETBALL LEAGUE - ROUND 5
